Source: https://www.gem.wiki/Thabametsi_power_station. Coordinates are approximate for the Thabametsi power station located in Waterberg, Limpopo, South Africa. Web search geocoded. Source: https://www.gem.wiki/Thabametsi_power_station. The Thabametsi power station is planned to be fueled by the Thabametsi coal mine, which is owned by Exxaro Resources

web_search_companies.notes: The Thabametsi Power Company is a special purpose vehicle owned by Marubeni and KEPCO, while Exxaro Resources owns the coal mine supplying the power station.
